tooltip: Select Fadola as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Fadola focuses on improving Food gathering and Population Capacity.
Allows you to summon Fadola, a ranged hero that attacks with a Slingshot.
Settlements and Outposts gather Fruit 50% faster and from once additional bushe at a time.
Community Houses all provide +1 additional Population.
Minutekids and Slingshotters have a small chance to gain extra Rupees from all loot.
